description: After the El Search Party reached Lanox, the group splits up to explore the village. In the village, Elsword meets the Fire Priestess Ignia and Elesis encounters the demons Jin and In. The demons invite Elesis to meet their commander Scar near the Burnt Forest outside of the village. Elesis fought the demon but was defeated. Soon after, Elsword arrives at the battlefield and angrily prepares to fight.
